concept.title: Release notes
concept.shortdesc: Couchbase Server version 4.0 is a major release that provides new features such as N1QL and significant enhancements to indexing and storage. The major innovations in 4.0 include multidimensional scaling (MDS), N1QL, filtering in XDCR, the ForestDB storage engine, LDAP, and auditing. These capabilities dramatically extend the scalability and performance advantages of Couchbase Server, as well as the ability to support a much broader set of use cases.

conbody.p: Couchbase Server 4.0 Release Candidate is released in Aug 2015.
